main.name: Nisha Shahi
main.bio: Hi there! I am Nisha! I have years of professional full stack development experience. I work with technologies like C#.Net, HTML5, CSS3, JS, JQuery, SQL, Bootstrap, Kendo UI, Responsive Design, Selenium, React and more. I am also responsible for the deployment and maintenance of multiple full stack web applications used by 50+ clients nationwide using technologies like Azure, AWS, Windows Server, IIS. I am a hardcore STEMINIST and love to encourage and see more women in technology.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to know more about me.!

education.degree: Master of Science, Applied Computer Science
education.description: Graduated with 4.0 GPA and received Outstanding Student in Computer Science Award

education.degree: Bachelor of Science, Computer Science and Imformation Technology

work.title: Application Developer
work.description: Designing and developing performant, responsive web applications for clients using .NET framework (ASP.NET), C#, AJAX, SQL Server, JavaScript, LINQ. Supporting existing client application with updates, maintenance, and new features or functionality using technologiesl like AWS, Windows Server, IIS, PowerShell, Task Scheduler. Implementing rich integrations for clients using Sendgrid, Mailchimp, Constant Contact, AWS S3 API, Stripe, Paypal, Authorize.Net, Zoom, GoToMeeting.

testimonials.text: She thinks. She dreams. She learns. She works. She inspires. She builds. She codes. She can.
